title: Learn
text1: Learn about the system that governs us
text2: Understand how the government works and how parties are elected in

title: Engage
text1: Learn how to engage with the system
text2: Simulate the experience of enrolling yourself to vote for the first time

title: Voice
text2: Have your say in what laws get passed and are discussed by our politicians

title: Resist
text1: Raise your voice against inadequacies that you see within the government

title: Seek
text1: Understand means of seeking information from the government
